changelog.0.4.8: update the TensorRT part in the README file
changelog.0.4.5: add the command of executing inference with TensorRT models
changelog.0.4.3: update this bundle to support TensorRT convert
changelog.0.4.0: add support for multi-GPU training and evaluation
changelog.0.3.2: restructure readme to match updated template
changelog.0.3.1: add figures of workflow and metrics, add invert transform
changelog.0.1.0: complete the first version model package

name: Endoscopic tool segmentation
description: A pre-trained binary segmentation model for endoscopic tool segmentation
label_classes: single channel data, 1/255 is tool, 0 is background
pred_classes: 2 channels OneHot data, channel 1 is tool, channel 0 is background
references: Tan, M. and Le, Q. V. Efficientnet: Rethinking model scaling for convolutional neural networks. ICML, 2019a. https://arxiv.org/pdf/1905.11946.pdf

O. Ronneberger, P. Fischer, and T. Brox. U-net: Convolutional networks for biomedical image segmentation. In International Conference on Medical image computing and computer-assisted intervention, pages 234–241. Springer, 2015. https://arxiv.org/pdf/1505.04597.pdf
